name: Basic Fantasy Pack
author: CharaForge
description: A foundational pack for creating classic fantasy characters. Includes races, classes, and basic equipment.

schema.prompt_template: A {style} portrait of a {gender} {race} {class}, with {hair_style} {hair_color} hair. They are wearing a {armor_torso} and {armor_legs}, wielding a {weapon}. The background is a {background_setting}.
